Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.18.2-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.18.2-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.18.2-4, affected by CVE-2024-24806
